import React from 'react' function Commentbox(props) { console.log(props.data._id) return ( <>
Name : {props.data.name} email : {props.data.email} Comment : {props.data.commentContent} Date : {props.data.date} Igone : {props.data.ignore} ParentNode : {props.data.parentNodeId}
) } export default Commentbox;
